data.text:
hi

i have tray many time to find solution but i have the same probleme

this is the error msg that i get when i tray to record a video

befor update to new version the software work with no error

i have delait obs and make a new install

i have delait the grafique card driver and install the last one .i have geforse GT 710

The solution that i have find it's to change ENCODER setting to X264

but the quality of video is bad any solution Plz

i have tray many solution best one is go to download the 28 version and enjoy

you will not have the msg error so don't update to thelast version of OBS

download the full 28 version from here

Release OBS Studio 28.0 Â· obsproject/obs-studio

If you would like to support the OBS Project, please consider contributing to our Patreon or Open Collective! NOTE: Some plugins may not be compatible with OBS 28. You can check the status of the m...

hi

i have tray many time to find solution but i have the same probleme

this is the error msg that i get when i tray to record a video

View attachment 88494

befor update to new version the software work with no error

i have delait obs and make a new install

i have delait the grafique card driver and install the last one .i have geforse GT 710

The solution that i have find it's to change ENCODER setting to X264

but the quality of video is bad any solution Plz

Hi, I think the 28.x version doesn't handle old parameters for NVENC: presets support changed => p1-p7, in 27.x used quality, performance and others.

Also, new presets don't work with older GPUs, I have a GTX 680 and it won't work at all specifying presets. The 28.x OBS will work well with newer graphics card drivers 500 not from 400 and older.

I did my research and I can say that the old presets were very well optimized. Recently added presets (they are far from new) work much worse (especially their performance) and I do not share the developers' opinion on adding them. The reason is probably the output of the RTX 4000 with AV1.

You won't lose anything if you stay on older versions of OBS. I hope that in the future everything will be fixed and optimized.
